name: OnOfre
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room”
”Alexa, lock garage gate”
”Alexa, close living room blinds”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill allows you to interact with all your Onofre devices, control them and get detailed information about their state. To use this skill you'll need to install Easy IOT controller on your local network, and enable this skill linking it to your google account or create a custom user for this purpose.
